name: Project Extraction
description:
Project Extraction is a single-player first-person horror. Find out what happened on a cargo spaceship, and what secrets people revealed while exploring the surface of Mars. Collect logbooks and personal diaries to shed light on the events which took place on the ship. Your actions affect the course of the plot and how this story ends.

Game contains graphic violence and gore.

This game is unfinished. There meant to be 4 endings but they broke at the last moment. We are aware of multiple bugs and will drop a bugfix version in a day.
